metering: Matrix, Centre-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), Spot (digital zoom 2X or more)
weightg: 120 g with battery and SD memory card
exposurecompensation: -2.0 to +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV
fileformat: Still: JPEG, DCF, Exif 2.3, and DPOF compliant, Movies: AVI (Motion-JPEG compliant) Audio: WAV
flashmodes: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
whitebalance: Auto, Cloudy, Daylight, Flash, Fluorescent, Incandescent, Preset, Manual
